敲.definition: to hit; to strike; to tap; to rap; to knock; to rip sb off; to overcharge

敲中背.definition: to receive oral sex from a prostitute

敲大背.definition: to have sex with a prostitute

敲定.definition: to come to a decision; to fix on (a date etc); to determine; to finalize; to nail down (a deal etc)

敲小背.definition: to be masturbated by a prostitute

敲山震虎.definition: a deliberate show of strength as a warning

敲打.definition: to beat sb; to beat (a drum)

敲打鑼鼓.definition: lit. to beat a gong; fig. to irritate sb; a provocation

敲敲打打.definition: to make a continual banging sound; (fig.) to provoke with words

敲榨.definition: to press (fruit); variant of 敲詐|敲诈[qiao1 zha4]

敲竹槓.definition: extortion by taking advantage of sb's weakness

敲詐.definition: to rip off; to extort (money); extortion; blackmail

敲邊鼓.definition: to back sb up; to support sb in an argument; (lit. to beat nearby drum)

敲鐘.definition: to sound a bell; (of a clock) to chime

敲鑼邊兒.definition: to strike the edge of the gong; (fig.) to stir the pot (i.e. cause or exacerbate a dispute)

敲門磚.definition: lit. a brick as a door knocker (idiom); fig. a temporary expedient; to use sb as a stepping stone to fortune

敲開.definition: to get sth open by tapping or striking it; (figuratively, when followed by sth like ∼的大門|∼的大门[xx5 de5 da4 men2]) to open the door to ~; to gain access to ~

敲響.definition: to sound a bell; to raise the alarm
